net.sourceforge.metware.binche.graph
Class ChebiGraph

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metware.binche.graph.ChebiGraph

public class ChebiGraph
extends Object

Class providing access to a directed graph plus visualisation functionality required to write and display the graph. The graph is tailored to deal with the ChEBI ontology.

Author:
Stephan Beisken, Pablo Moreno

Constructor Summary
ChebiGraph(List<BiNChENode> enrichmentNodes, cytoscape.data.annotation.Ontology ontology, Set<String> inputNodes)
          Constructs the ChEBI graph relying on the new BiNChENode instead of the maps.

Constructor Detail

ChebiGraph

public ChebiGraph(List<BiNChENode> enrichmentNodes,
                  cytoscape.data.annotation.Ontology ontology,
                  Set<String> inputNodes)
Constructs the ChEBI graph relying on the new BiNChENode instead of the maps. Each node contains its p-value and corrected p-value among others.

Parameters:
enrichmentNodes - the list of nodes produced as a result of the execution of BiNChE
ontology - the parsed ontology
inputNodes - the set of input ChEBI ids
Method Detail

setpValueThreshold

public void setpValueThreshold(Double pValueThreshold)
Only P-Values below the set threshold will be considered for the coloring scheme. P-Values above will have the default color.

Parameters:
pValueThreshold -

Gets the visualisation viewer to display the graph.

Parameters:
dimension - size of the viewer window
Returns:
the visualisation viewer

isLeaf

public boolean isLeaf(ChebiVertex vertex)
Checks whether the given vertex is a leaf (in-degree == 0) in the graph.

Parameters:
vertex - the node to check
Returns:
true if vertex is a leaf.

getOutEdges

public Collection<ChebiEdge> getOutEdges(ChebiVertex chebiVertex)
Returns the out edges for a ChebiVertex.

Parameters:

Returns:
a collection containing all edges that depart from chebiVertex.

Returns the in edges for a ChebiVertex.

Parameters:

getRoot

@Deprecated
public ChebiVertex getRoot()
Deprecated. use getRoots() instead.

Returns the root of the graph, the ChebiVertex which only has incoming edges (the most general ChEBI node).

Returns:
root vertex or null if the graph has no root.

Returns:
